Articles.Content: Hey guys, how would I be able to make a community save game? Am I supposed to have some kind of permit, or can I do it by myself? And, if i could, how would I share it?

You might want to look here!

 

But anyway I do not think you need a permit or anything. To share the file just find the persistent.sfs file under your save, and then send it as a private message, or use a sharing service like google drive or dropbox.
Yes, there already is one. You don't need permission to start another, though, if you wanted to.
